name: Line and Ball
description:
注意:此為測試版，這不會是最終版本

_________________________________________________

目標 :

試試利用畫線將球從黃色起點引入綠色終點，越少碰撞及關卡越高者，獲得越多分數

_________________________________________________

操作方式:

滑鼠左鍵畫線

右鍵或點右下角按鈕 生成小球

================================

Attention : This is a demo version, and will not be the final version.

_________________________________________________

Goal :

Draw the line and help the white ball reach to the red end point. The lest bouncing and the most level you get , the most score you can have.

_________________________________________________

Control :

mouse right click : draw line

left click or bottom-right button : spawn white ball

你可以在下面下載此遊戲apk

You can download apk file below.
